name: RUTH AFEELbY
message: We want to hear from you! We want to know why Doral is your favorite brand. Is it the value? The way we like to show you we appreciate your business? The taste? Something else? Let us know and you may see your letter in an upcoming issue of Doral & Co.

contact.mail: The Doral & Co. Mailbox P.O. Box 7 Winston-Salem NC 27102
